classData.comment:
/**
 * @class Neo.component.Video
 * @extends Neo.component.Base
 *
 * @example
 *     ntype   : 'video',
 *     url     : 'https://video-ssl.itunes.apple.com/itunes-assets/Video125/v4/a0/57/54/a0575426-dd8e-2d25-bdf3-139702870b50/mzvf_786190431362224858.640x464.h264lc.U.p.m4v'
 *     autoplay: true
 *
 * @methods
 *      play
 *      pause
 */
classData.name: Video

classData.comment:
/**
         * Automatically start the video
         * Initial setting, which does not make sense to change later
         * !!Most browsers only support muted autostart
         * @member {Boolean} autoplay=false
         */
classData.description: Automatically start the video Initial setting, which does not make sense to change later !!Most browsers only support muted autostart
classData.name: autoplay

classData.comment:
/**
         * In case the browser does not support the video source the component should show an error.
         * @member {String} errorMsg='The browser does not support the video'
         */
classData.description: In case the browser does not support the video source the component should show an error.
classData.name: errorMsg

classData.comment:
/**
         * Current state of the video
         * @member {Boolean} playing_=false
         */
classData.name: playing_

classData.comment:
/**
     * afterSetPlaying - run the event listeners
     * @param {Boolean} value
     * @param {Boolean} oldValue
     */
classData.name: afterSetPlaying

classData.comment:
/**
     * Add a source element into the video element containing the url
     * @param {String} value
     * @param {String|null} oldValue
     */
classData.description: Add a source element into the video element containing the url
classData.name: afterSetUrl

classData.comment:
/**
     * autoplay - run the event listeners
     * Only called in constructor and sets playing => calls update already
     *
     * Rationale: update() sends the vdom & vnode on a workers roundtrip to get the deltas.
     * While this is happening,  the component locks itself for future updates until the new vnode got back (async).
     * After the delay the framework  would trigger a 2nd roundtrip to get the deltas for the visible node.
     *
     * @protected
     */
classData.description:
autoplay - run the event listeners Only called in constructor and sets playing => calls update already

Rationale: update() sends the vdom & vnode on a workers roundtrip to get the deltas. While this is happening, the component locks itself for future updates until the new vnode got back (async). After the delay the framework would trigger a 2nd roundtrip to get the deltas for the visible node.
classData.name: handleAutoplay
